extendedInfo.description: Also known as Out Of This Worldâ¢ and released across more than a dozen platforms since its 1991 debut, Another Worldâ¢ has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike for its cinematic effects in the graphics, sound and cut scenes.A CAPTIVATING ADVENTUREThe actor plays the part of Lester Knight Chaykin, a young physics researcher. While he is right in the middle of doing experiments, his laboratory is struck by lighting and completely destroyed, hurling him into another world, a world populated by humanoid creatures, where danger can spring at any moment.You must escape from this strange civilization. You will nonetheless meet a companion who will soon become your ally and help you in this merciless fight!20th ANNIVERSARY EDITION SPECIALLY THOUGHT OUT FOR ANDROIDâ¢ Switch from the original graphics to HD graphics by sliding two fingers on the screen at any time in the gameâ¢ New Touch controls specially redesigned or classic D-pad (directional arrows and original action buttons)â¢ 3 difficulty modes: Normal (easier than the original), Hard (similar to the original) and Hardcore (harder than the original)â¢ Sound and sound effects are 100% remasteredâ¢ Scoreloop with over 10 Achievementsâ¢ Compatible with Bluetooth-connected Zeemote joysticksâ¢ 5 languages available (English, French, Italian, German, Spanish)â¢ Xperia PLAY optimized.â¢ MOGA and MOGA Pro controller supportMore information on:anotherworld.frfacebook.com/another.world.officialfacebook.com/dotemu twitter.com/dotemuyoutube.com/dotemu

reviews.title: Oh, the memories!
reviews.comment: I used to replay the original over and over again until I could complete the game without dying once. This is every bit as good as the original. With better graphics!
reviews.author: J.R. Gracen

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: So glad to see this on An droid. It\'s a fantastic game even by today\'s standards. If you enjoy action/adventure games and have never played Another World, you owe it to yourself to play it.
reviews.author: Mike Parrish

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I haven\'t played this in so long but it\'s always been one of my favorites. Thanks! Please do the sequel!
reviews.author: Michael Strawn

reviews.title: Wonderful.
reviews.comment: An absolutely breathtaking, gorgeous game with intuitive yet challenging play. This is a classic that lives up to its name and then some.
reviews.author: Margret Storm

reviews.title: Wonderfull, will you also do Flashback?
reviews.comment: Great classic game and plays very well on my tablet. When/Will Flashback come again?
reviews.author: Stevan Pavlicic

reviews.comment: Great game and nice visual upgrade, but this sort of game does not work well with touch controls. Must have buttons.
reviews.author: Vagabond Vagabondish

reviews.title: A great game.
reviews.comment: I had forgotten his great this game is! It\'s a great replication of the original. The controls take a few minutes to get used to, just like the original, but when you have the results are spot on. Well worth the download.
reviews.author: Keir Fuller

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: This game set the bar for \"interactive storytelling\" years ago, and its just as much fun now as it was then!
reviews.author: Gary Oak

reviews.title: Great version.
reviews.comment: Classic game and not a bad port.
reviews.author: Mick Law

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: This game was way ahead of it\'s time when released and is still amazing today.
reviews.author: Conor Hildebrandt

reviews.title: A throwback to the past
reviews.comment: This is a game that pushed the boundaries of story telling and graphics at the time. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Brandon Wolfe

reviews.title: Great game, missing some aspects
reviews.comment: Would have liked out of this world included, and the lack of original music from the amega cd disappoints me, let alone music atall. The final cut cut scene is very disappointing as im used to the sega cd\'s version. You made a great effort at a port to smartphones, i just think you honestly could have done alot better. If you want a great puzzle solving game to bide your time for hours pick this one up, but if you want to see this gane the way it was meant to be seen pick up a sega cd emulator.
reviews.author: Myles Daske

reviews.title: Can\'t download
reviews.comment: As soon as I\'m done downloading, when it starts to install the game, I get the error \"Package file invalid\", and I have to do it all over again, just to get he same error in the end. Please fix this.
reviews.author: Nima Faraji

reviews.title: Let down by the controls
reviews.comment: Looks great, the updated graphics are just a smooth version of the old ones, and the original graphics are provided as well.   Unfortunately, as is so often the case with touch screen ports, this game is let down by the controls.  I was able to make NO progress using the on-screen controls. I bought a ZeeMote and found that the ZeeMote\'s analog stick just isn\'t the right thing for a game designed for a 4-way joystick (I\'m unable to consistently run using the ZeeMote).   I suspect it might be OK with the MOGA pro controller (if you can use the d-pad instead of the analog sticks). Alternately, if you can get a WiiMote or other game pad to function, and map correctly, that would probably do just fine as well.
reviews.author: Michael Kohne

reviews.title: Awesome translation
reviews.comment: The polish given to this version is absolutely amazing.  I\'ve found the controls on my unit to be very responsive(took some getting used to, but after some time, they actually work better than a PC or console controller).    All-in-all, worth every penny(and then some)
reviews.author: Da Mi

reviews.comment: Great game. Very nostalgic.  Thank you. Controls are a little difficult but otherwise great game
reviews.author: Prez Konczyk

reviews.title: Its fine
reviews.comment: Nice game
reviews.author: Daniel Dobles

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: So addictive. I forgot how much you just want to get to the next stage. Roll on flashback on the xbox :-)
reviews.author: Andy Swalwell

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: Good PUZZLES
reviews.author: Emile Belanger

reviews.comment: Cool reminds me of old times :-)
reviews.author: Skot Willis
